TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class RibbonBase : System.ComponentModel.Component, IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RibbonBase extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 作为 Microsoft Office 功能区自定义项的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for Microsoft Office Ribbon customizations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加新**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项到 Office 项目，Visual Studio 将添加功能区类，该类继承到项目。When you add a new **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project, Visual Studio adds a Ribbon class that inherits from to the project. 包含方法和属性所共有的所有功能区类。 contains methods and properties that are common to all Ribbon classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区设计器](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md). 某些属性只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，才可以设置。Some properties of can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory factory) cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此构造函数创建的实例类。Do not use this constructor to create an instance of the class. 添加新**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项目到项目，Visual Studio 创建继承自的类的实例。When you add a new **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project, Visual Studio creates an instance of a class that inherits from .

summary.span: 获取此 对象扩展的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that this object extends.

value.span: 此 对象扩展的对象。

span.span: The object that this object extends.

summary.span: 关闭此 实例时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this instance is closing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此事件来释放已分配更早版本，例如，在应用程序特定资源事件。You can use this event to release application-specific resources that were allocated earlier, for example, in the event.

summary.span: 获取 Outlook 中与此功能区关联的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口。

span.span: Gets the Inspector window, or the Explorer window in Outlook, that is associated with this Ribbon.

value.span: 一个 ，表示与此 对象关联的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口。

span.span: An that represents the Inspector window or Explorer window that is associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Outlook 中，此属性指的检查器窗口或资源管理器窗口中此显示。In Outlook, this property refers to the Inspector window or Explorer window in which this is displayed. 在所有其他 Office 项目中，此属性返回 null。In all other Office projects, this property returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).

summary.span: 获取或设置与此 关联的功能区工厂。

span.span: Gets or sets the Ribbon factory that is associated with this .

value.span: 一个实现 接口的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来跟踪创建的当前实例的功能区工厂类。You can use this property to track the Ribbon factory class that created the current instance of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定此 是否可以同时在多个上下文中使用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether this can be used in multiple contexts simultaneously.

value.span: 如果此 对象在多个上下文中共享，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this object is shared among multiple contexts; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有此属性设置为对象`false`每次打开新的 Outlook 检查器时创建。 objects that have this property set to `false` are created every time a new Outlook Inspector is opened. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: 当 加载到 Microsoft Office 应用程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the is loaded into the Microsoft Office application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件处理程序将自动添加到功能区代码文件。The event handler is automatically added to the Ribbon code file. 使用此事件处理程序功能区加载时运行自定义代码。Use this event handler to run custom code when the Ribbon loads.

summary.span: 如果为一个或多个控件设置 ImageName 属性，则在 加载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the loads, if the **ImageName** property is set for one or more controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件，可以缓存中功能区自定义项，这可以提高性能的映像。The event enables you to cache images in the Ribbon customization, which can improve performance. 默认情况下，映像加载到功能区，每次用户显示包含图像的选项卡。By default, an image is loaded into the Ribbon every time the user displays a tab that contains the image. 映像重新加载，以编程方式更改图像将显示的控件的属性的任何时间。An image is reloaded any time that you programmatically change the properties of a control on which the image appears. 使用事件将分配给控件的图像。Use the event to assign an image to a control. 当用户选择功能区上的选项卡时，Microsoft Office 应用程序将使用缓存的映像。When the user selects a tab on the Ribbon, the Microsoft Office application uses the cached image. 如果在运行时修改控件属性，Microsoft Office 应用程序将不重新加载该控件上的映像。If you modify a control property at run time, the Microsoft Office application will not reload the image on the control. 这可以为你提供可略微提高性能。This can give you a small performance gain. 如果你想要缓存的控件图像，设置**ImageName**的控件属性。If you want to cache the image of a control, set the **ImageName** property of the control. 除非你设置，则不会引发事件**ImageName**至少一个控件的属性。The event is not raised unless you set the **ImageName** property of at least one control. ## Examples 下面的示例适用于两个缓存图像控件。The following example caches the images for two controls. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: - 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** to an Office project. - 如果你使用的 Visual Basic 项目，到功能区代码文件的顶部添加以下语句： `Imports Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon`If you are using a Visual Basic project, add the following statement to the top of the Ribbon code file: `Imports Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon` 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class. ```vb Private Sub Ribbon1_LoadImage(sender As Object, e As RibbonLoadImageEventArgs) Select Case e.ImageName Case "Button1Image" e.Image = My.Resources.Image1 Case "Button2Image" e.Image = My.Resources.Image2 End Select End Sub ``` ```csharp private void Ribbon1_LoadImage(object sender, RibbonLoadImageEventArgs e) { switch (e.ImageName) { case "Button1Image": e.Image = Properties.Resources.Image1; break; case "Button2Image": e.Image = Properties.Resources.Image2; break; } } ```

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of this .

value.span: 一个字符串，包含此 的名称。

span.span: A string that contains the name of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的名称显示在**属性**窗口。The name of a control shows up in the **Properties** window. 它是 Microsoft Office 可以使用以确定该 ID ，它是此实例的名称和在代码中。It is the ID that Microsoft Office uses to identify this , and it is the name of the instance of this in your code. 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the Microsoft Office Menu customization.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项。

span.span: A that represents the Microsoft Office Menu customization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Office 菜单是当单击打开的菜单**文件**选项卡 （对于 Microsoft Office 2010) 或**Microsoft Office 按钮**（适用于 2007 Microsoft Office 系统）。The Microsoft Office Menu is the menu that opens when you click the **File** tab (for Microsoft Office 2010) or the **Microsoft Office Button** (for the 2007 Microsoft Office system). 只能通过使用功能区设计器，可以将控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单。You can add controls to the Microsoft Office Menu only by using the Ribbon Designer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md). 可以在运行时的 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项中的功能区控件的只读集合的访问通过使用属性公开由的实例属性。You can access a read-only collection of Ribbon controls in the Microsoft Office Menu customization at run time by using the property of the instance that is exposed by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例获取 Microsoft Office 菜单自定义项中的自定义控件的数量。The following example gets the number of custom controls in the Microsoft Office Menu customization. > [!NOTE] > 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 到 Office 项目。To run this code example, you must first add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** to an Office project. 然后可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class. ```vb Dim numControlsInOfficeMenu As Integer = Me.OfficeMenu.Items.Count ``` ```csharp int numControlsInOfficeMenu = this.OfficeMenu.Items.Count; ```

summary.span: 获取一个表示此 的 的父级的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the parent of the of this .

value.span: 一个表示此 的 的父级的 。

span.span: A that represents the parent of the of this .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformDynamicLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 如果 的 具有一个动态父级（如动态菜单）且布局未挂起，则调用父控件的 Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl 方法。

span.span: Calls the Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl method of the parent control if the of the has a dynamic parent, such as a dynamic menu, and layout is not suspended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果父不是动态的此方法调用`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl`如果布局则不会挂起当前控件的方法。If the parent is not dynamic, this method calls the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.InvalidateControl` method of the current control if the layout is not suspended.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 刷新功能区用户界面。

span.span: Refreshes the Ribbon user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法。This method is called by the method. 此方法在内部调用`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.Invalidate`方法。Internally, this method calls the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonUI.Invalidate` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResumeLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 取消 方法的效果。

span.span: Reverses the effect of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用可能会导致性能稍有增加，如果你的应用程序具有很多会频繁更新的控件。Calling may result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated. 更改每个控件的状态后，你可以调用以允许 UI 进行刷新。After you change the state of each control, you can call to allow the UI to be refreshed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResumeLayout(bool performLayout) cil managed

param.name: performLayout
param.span: 若要调用 方法，请使用 。

span.span: to call the method.

param.span: 若要启用 UI 刷新，而不调用 ，请使用 。

span.span: to enable UI refreshes without calling .

summary.span: 取消 方法的效果。

span.span: Reverses the effect of the method.

summary.span: 获取用于创建 类的此实例的功能区 ID。

span.span: Gets the Ribbon ID that was used to create this instance of the class.

value.span: 用于创建 类的此实例的功能区 ID。

span.span: The Ribbon ID that was used to create this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应尝试设置此属性。You should not attempt to set this property. 你可以使用要获取与此相关联的功能区 Id 的所有属性实例。You can use the property to get all of the Ribbon IDs that are associated with this instance. 属性返回仅用于创建此单个 ID实例。The property returns only the single ID that was used to create this instance. 例如，可以使用此属性来确定是否正在邮件组合项中显示的此功能区实例。For example, you can use this property to determine whether this Ribbon instance is being displayed in a mail composition item.

summary.span: 获取功能区 ID 的逗号分隔的列表，这些功能区 ID 与此 实例相关联。

span.span: Gets a comma-separated list of Ribbon IDs that are associated with this instance.

value.span: 功能区 ID 的逗号分隔的列表，这些功能区 ID 与此 实例相关联。

span.span: A comma-separated list of Ribbon IDs that are associated with this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel、 Word 和 PowerPoint 通常在此属性中具有只有一个功能区 ID。Excel, Word, and PowerPoint typically have only one Ribbon ID in this property. Outlook 可以拥有多个 Id，为其对应的各个消息类特定实例无效。Outlook can have several IDs, corresponding to the various message classes for which the particular instance is valid. 设计器提供有效的功能区 Id 的下拉列表。The designer provides a drop-down list of valid Ribbon IDs. 功能区 Id 用于将功能区类与特定的上下文窗口相关联。Ribbon IDs are used to associate a Ribbon class with a particular context window. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取 Microsoft Office 应用程序提供给功能区扩展性代码的 IRibbonUI 实例。

span.span: Gets the IRibbonUI instance that is provided by the Microsoft Office application to the Ribbon extensibility code.

value.span: IRibbonUI提供了功能区扩展性代码 Office 应用程序的实例。

span.span: The IRibbonUI instance that is provided by the Office application to the Ribbon extensibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于更新功能区 UI。This property can be used to update Ribbon UI.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否隐藏功能区上的所有内置选项卡和 Microsoft Office 菜单上的大部分命令，并且是否仅显示在此功能区项中定义的自定义项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to hide all built-in tabs on the Ribbon and most commands on the Microsoft Office Menu and display only the customizations that are defined in this Ribbon item.

value.span: 如果功能区仅显示在此功能区项中定义的自定义项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Ribbon displays only the customizations that are defined in this Ribbon item; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此属性。This property can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 你不能在运行时更改的自定义选项卡可见性，如果此属性设置为`true`。You cannot change the visibility of custom tabs at run time if this property is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SuspendLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 阻止 Microsoft Office 应用程序刷新功能区上的控件状态。

span.span: Prevents the Microsoft Office application from refreshing the state of controls on the Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用可能会导致性能稍有增加，如果你的应用程序具有很多会频繁更新的控件。Calling may result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated. 更改每个控件的状态后，你可以调用以允许 UI 进行刷新。After you change the state of each control, you can call to allow the UI to be refreshed.

summary.span: 获取 中 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects in the .
A collection of objects in the .

summary.span: 获取或设置与此 关联的应用程序特定的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets application-specific data that is associated with this .

value.span: System.Object表示与此关联的应用程序特定数据。

span.span: An System.Object that represents application-specific data that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生的任何类型`System.Object`类可以分配给此属性。Any type derived from the `System.Object` class can be assigned to this property. 但是，如果你设置Visual Studio 中的属性**属性**窗口中，你可以仅将文本分配。However, if you set the property in the Visual Studio **Properties** window, you can only assign text.
